channel.title: Username problem
channel.description:
Whenever I log onto my server, with a username longer than 4 letters, it'll only show the last four letters on the chat screen.
Ex: If I logged in as 'Derosion' It would show 'Sion'
Any idea as to how I can fix this?

item.title: Username problem
item.dc:creator: @Derosion Derosion
item.description:
@Derosion wrote:

Whenever I log onto my server, with a username longer than 4 letters, it’ll only show the last four letters on the chat screen.

If I logged in as ‘Derosion’
It would show ‘Sion’

Any idea as to how I can fix this?
